features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

SIMPLE YET ELEGANT STYLING: The Essentials Island Full Size 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is timeless in style and carefully crafted to feature a full-sized minimalistic island design, modern round spindles, and a smooth to the touch finish

PREMIUM QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers and backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED: Designed to fit a standard-sized crib mattress, this Oxford Baby 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Oxford Baby Essentials 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification; GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
body.description: The Essentials Collection by Oxford Baby combines simplicity with style in high-quality nursery furniture must-haves. With its minimalistic style agnostic design, the Essentials Collection is perfectly compatible with any nursery décor. The Essentials Island 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is timeless in style and carefully crafted to feature a minimalistic slatted headboard and footboard, modern round spindles, and a smooth to the touch finish. Thoughtfully designed to fit a standard-sized crib mattress, this Essentials Island 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child. The Essentials Collection by Oxford Baby in Pink features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12413040), 3-Drawer Dresser (12433040), Changing Topper (12463040), Changing Station (12467040), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (12495040), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (12488040), and Oxford Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately. The Essentials Collection is available in fashionable Gray, White, and Pink finishes. This full-size Oxford Baby Crib arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly. The crib measures 54 in. W x 29.25 in. D x 34 in. H (36.08 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 50 pounds when used as a crib, toddler bed, or day bed and 400 pounds when converted to a full-size bed. Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby. Plus, this crib is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty. The Oxford Baby Essentials Island Full Size 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greenguard Gold Certified Tested for over 10,000 chemicals and VOC's, ensuring that your little one is sleeping in a safe and healthy environment. 3 Adjustable Height Settings Thoughtfully designed to lower as your baby crawls, sits, and stands. The mattress support will lower to accommodate your child's growing needs. Superior Construction Oxford Baby cribs are made from the finest materials for durability, and sourced from sustainable forests.

Essential Crib The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Crib grows with your child over time for long-lasting value. Essential Toddler Bed The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Crib adapts into a grand toddler bed; this stage teaches your child to get in and out of bed on their own. Toddler Guard Rail sold separately. Essential Day Bed For added versatility, the Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a day bed. Essential Full Size Bed The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a spacious full size bed for your little one. Full Bed Conversion Kit sold separately.
